title: Wall Street crumbles in record selloff
text:
Wall Street crumbles in record selloff Tuesday, February 06, 2018 - 00:36 
U.S. stocks plunged in highly volatile trading on Monday, with the Dow industrials falling nearly 1,600 points during the session, its biggest intraday decline in history, as investors grappled with rising bond yields and potentially firming inflation. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
